LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateCombat.label: brain template (combat)
LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateCombat.description: A modification chip that can be installed in sleeve incubators that tune a sleeves brain to a specific skill, no matter the stack installed. Only one template can be installed in an incubator at a time without overloading it.
LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateWorker.label: brain template (worker)
LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateWorker.description: A modification chip that can be installed in sleeve incubators that tune a sleeves brain to a specific skill, no matter the stack installed. Only one template can be installed in an incubator at a time without overloading it.
LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateInfiltrator.label: brain template (infiltrator)
LanguageData.UT_BrainTemplateInfiltrator.description: A modification chip that can be installed in sleeve incubators that tune a sleeves brain to a specific skill, no matter the stack installed. Only one template can be installed in an incubator at a time without overloading it.
